metadata.Title: CVE-2022-48303 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: GNU Tar through 1.34 has a one-byte out-of-bounds read that results in use of uninitialized memory for a conditional jump. Exploitation to change the flow of control has not been demonstrated. The issue occurs in from_header in list.c via a V7 archive in which mtime has approximately 11 whitespace characters.

criterions.comment: tar: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
